title: A guide to never being banned again
body:
There . I deleted the post. Since everyone wants to instantly make me the bad guy for trying to find a replacement for blatant toxicity aka racism and name calling.  This experiment worked and the only true way to not get penalized in league when the match is over is to not voice your opinion whatsoever in chat throughout the entire game because at the end of the day whatever you say will be used against you . 

*I do not support toxic behavior , but I also do not support the banning of people that spend thousands of dollars on this game only to get banned from a few negative phrases*

replies.body: {{champion:267}} Locking this discussion as OP has deleted the original thread content.

Typing out your negativity one word-per-line won't change the negativity, and the IFS will still punish you for it. Additionally, adding positive chat won't change the negativity either.

> ...if you read what I said it clearly says no negativity.

Accusing someone of feeding and telling them to stop _is_ negativity.

Also, encouraging players to try to circumvent the IFS (through breaking chat down into multiple, one-word lines of chat or adding facetious positivity) or be negative in general (through ping-spamming to vent frustration at a given player) are against the [_Boards Universal Rules_](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/ITFIpNUE).

> **Advocating Violations of the Rules**
>
> Do not post content advocating or soliciting violations of the [Terms of Use](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse), [Summonerâ€™s Code](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/summoners-code), or Board Rules. Players encouraging this sort of behavior will be punished as if they had engaged in it themselves.
If this is truly a concerning post then please take it down i just wanted to help the people that have spent alot of money on this game and have a hard time being positive ALL THE TIME.

> If this is truly a concerning post then please take it down...

Would that I could, but I'm a Specialist, not a Moderator. I'm basically just a knowledgeable player with a blue screenname flair; I have no ability to take down or moderate posts.

> ...i just wanted to help the people that have spent alot of money on this game and have a hard time being positive ALL THE TIME.

Trying to subvert the system isn't the way to go about it, though. People need to practice restraint and find other methods to vent their frustrations, not try to fly under the radar while still being toxic/negative.

Tjis isnt a guide to negativity its a guide to reframe from calling people names . Ive come a long way from where I was before and all I wanted to do in this post was help people who have a hard time containing themselves. Which is like 50% of the player base.
i just disabled chat for a while then enabled it and learned to type less out of habit of it being disabled

LOL...dude, the IFS isn't strictly keyword based. If you're belligerent as fuck like in your example, you **will** get reported, and you **will** get punished eventually.

Your tips and tricks are ridiculous.
And from how you replied to me you don't seem like the type of person that should be responding to this.

Relax . This is for the people that cannot control their rage and still want to enjoy this game. I obviously am not one of those people as ive been unbanned and fine for 11 months now. But I do want to help the people that are like me and get frustrated sometimes .

OP is wasting peoples time, if you dont wanna get banned ( ive been banned over 70 times ) here you go.

My method is letting your anger out by pinging and saying short phrases which has really helped in taking away my toxicity since I don't have that built up rage.
